Package etomica.data.meter

Class MeterKineticEnergy

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.data.DataSourceScalar
      • etomica.data.meter.MeterKineticEnergy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataSource

    public class MeterKineticEnergy
extends DataSourceScalar
    Meter for the total kinetic energy in a box Computes total KE by summing values of KE returned by every atom in the box. A different box-dependent atom integrator may be set to permit calculation over a particular set of atoms in the box.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class etomica.data.DataSourceScalar

      Returns the total kinetic energy summed over all atoms produced by the iterator when applied to the given box.

    • Method Detail

      • getIterator

        public AtomIteratorBoxDependent getIterator​()
        Returns the iterator that defines the atoms summed for their kinetic energy.

      • getDataAsScalar

        public double getDataAsScalar​()
        Returns the total kinetic energy summed over all atoms produced by the iterator when applied to the given box. Does not include contributions from atoms having infinite mass (it assumes they are stationary).
        Specified by:
        getDataAsScalar in class DataSourceScalar

      • getBox

        public Box getBox​()
        Returns:
        Returns the box.
